<Title><![CDATA[Industrial/Military Uses]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[This group features a heat map showing the number of overlapping dominant use areas for all types of industrial/military uses as well as the General Use and Dominant Use footprints for the individual uses which contribute to this sector.  These uses include:  aquaculture, military operations, mining and mineral extraction, potential offshore alternative energy, offshore oil and gas, shipping, and underwater cables.    The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time. ]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>1</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Underwater Cables]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Underwater cables includes ocean observing and telecommunications; excludes cables associated with utilities and energy transmission, lost fishing gears.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>1</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=1" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>2</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Shipping]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Shipping includes ships, large commercial vessels, shipping routes and channels including maintenance, and ferries; excludes cruise ships, oil and LNG tankers.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>2</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=2" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>3</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Offshore Oil and Gas]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Offshore oil and gas includes exploration, production, transportation of gas or oil, LNG, fuel terminals, pipelines, tankers, and seismic air gun exploration; excludes alternative energy operations.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>3</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=3" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>4</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Offshore Alternative Energy - Potential]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Offshore alternative energy includes  potential areas for wave, current, tidal, wind, solar, and associated infrastructure (cables and moorings); excludes oil, gas, and LNG activities.    The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>4</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=4" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>5</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Mining and Mineral Extraction]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Mining and mineral extraction includes sand and gravel, seabed mining, dredging; excludes energy production and beach renourishment.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>5</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=5" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>6</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Military Operations]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Military operations includes test ranges, war games, acoustic arrays, ship and submarine maneuvers, restricted areas, and munitions disposal; excludes war-time operations.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>6</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=6" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>7</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Aquaculture]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Aquaculture includes net pens and shellfish; excludes onshore facilities linked to offshore operations.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time.]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>7</Title>           <LegendURL width="88" height="32">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=7" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>8</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Industrial/Military Dominant Use Summary]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[A heat map showing the number (out of a total of 7) of overlapping dominant use areas for all types of industrial/military uses.  These uses include:  aquaculture, military operations, mining and mineral extraction, potential offshore alternative energy, offshore oil and gas, shipping, and underwater cables.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where a use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time. ]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>         <Style>           <Name>default</Name>           <Title>8</Title>           <LegendURL width="22" height="64">             <Format>image/png</Format>             <OnlineResource xlink:href="http://coast.noaa.gov/arcgis/services/MarineCadastre/CaliforniaOceanUses/MapServer/WmsServer?request=GetLegendGraphic%26version=1.3.0%26format=image/png%26layer=8" xlink:type="simple" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" />           </LegendURL>         </Style>       </Layer>       </Layer>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Title><![CDATA[Extractive/Fishing Uses]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[This group features a heat map showing the number of overlapping dominant use areas for all types of extractive/fishing uses as well as the general use and dominant use footprints for the individual uses which contribute to this sector. These uses include: commercial dive fishing, commercial fishing with benthic fixed gear, commercial fishing with benthic mobile gear, commercial kelp and algae harvest, commercial pelagic fishing, hunting, kayak fishing, recreational dive fishing, recreational fishing from boats, shore-based recreational harvest, and shore-based fishing.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity.  The Dominant Use areas include areas where the use is most commonly pursued and are defined as areas within the general use footprint that are routinely used by most users most of the time. ]]></Abstract> <CRS>CRS:84</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:4326</CRS> <CRS>EPSG:3857</CRS>  <!-- alias 3857 --> <CRS>EPSG:102100</CRS> <EX_GeographicBoundingBox><westBoundLongitude>-129.005271</westBoundLongitude><eastBoundLongitude>-117.078696</eastBoundLongitude><southBoundLatitude>30.538074</southBoundLatitude><northBoundLatitude>42.019745</northBoundLatitude></EX_GeographicBoundingBox> <BoundingBox CRS="CRS:84" minx="-129.005271" miny="30.538074" maxx="-117.078696" maxy="42.019745"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:4326" minx="30.538074" miny="-129.005271" maxx="42.019745" maxy="-117.078696"/> <BoundingBox CRS="EPSG:3857" minx="-14360801.037500" miny="3572903.398000" maxx="-13033140.872800" maxy="5163937.600500"/>       <Layer queryable="1">         <Name>10</Name>         <Title><![CDATA[Shore-based Fishing]]></Title>         <Abstract><![CDATA[Shore-based fishing includes rod and reel, surf-casting, fishing from piers, jetties, crap traps, cast nets; excludes all other forms of shore-based fishing.  The General Use footprint includes all areas in which the use is known to occur with some regularity, regardless of frequency or intensity. This includes nine (9) non-consumptive/recreational uses, eleven (11) extractive/fishing uses, and seven (7) industrial/military uses.
